entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
